2:
Praise him, all his angels;\q praise him, all his hosts.


\q
3:
Praise him, sun and moon;\q praise him, all you shining stars.
\q
4:
Praise him, highest heaven\q and you waters that are above the sky.


\q
5:
Let them praise the name of Yahweh,\q for he gave the command, and they were created.
\q
6:
He has also established them forever and ever;\q he issued a decree that will never change.


\q
7:
Praise him from the earth,\q you sea monsters and all ocean depths,
\q
8:
fire and hail, snow and clouds,\q stormy wind fulfilling his word.


\q
9:
Praise him, mountains and all hills,\q fruit trees and all cedars,
\q
10:
animals wild and tame,\q creatures that crawl and birds.

 
\q
11:
Praise Yahweh, kings of the earth and all nations,\q princes and all who govern on the earth,
\q
12:
both young men and young women,\q elderly and children.


\q
13:
Let them all praise the name of Yahweh,\q for his name alone is exalted
\q and his glory extends over the earth and the heavens.
\q
14:
He has lifted up the horn of his people\q for praise from all his faithful ones,
\q the Israelites, the people near to him.
\q Praise Yahweh.
